Related Character(s): 水, 石
Связанный символ (и): вода, камень

沰字的基本解释

沰
tuō
落。
赭色。
浇。

沰
duó
滴：滴沰。

沰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tuō］
［《廣韻》他各切，入鐸，透。］
红褐色。
[②]［duó］
［《集韻》當各切，入鐸，端。］
见“滴沰”。

沰字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　沰； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页613第06
【廣韻】他各切【集韻】闥各切，?音託。【玉篇】落也，磓也。　又【廣韻】赭也。【詩·秦風·顏如渥丹】《釋文》丹如字，韓詩作沰。音撻各反。赭也。　又【集韻】當各切，音矺。滴也。【崔實·農家諺】上火不落，下火滴沰。

考證：〔【詩·秦風·顏如渥丹箋】丹如字，韓詩作沰。音撻各反。赭也。〕　謹按丹如字云云本釋文非鄭箋。謹改箋字爲釋文。

沰字的起名意思

暂无。

drop.

沰
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [tuō]
["Guangyun" he cuts each, enters the priest, and is thorough. ]
Reddish brown.
[②]［duó］
["Jiyun" should cut each, enter the duo, and end. ]
See "Drip".
沰
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 1] [Water Word Department] 　沰; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 613 06
[Guang Yun] He cuts all [Ji Yun] All cuts, sound support. [Jade articles] Falling also, 磓 Ye.　[Guangyun] Zheya. [Poetry·Qin Feng·Yan Ruwo Dan] "Explanation of Wen" Dan is like a character, written by Han poems. The sound tarts are reversed. Ochre also.　[Jiyun] When each cut, the sound is 矺. Drop also. [Cui Shi·Farmer's Proverb] If you get angry, you don't fall, but the fire drips down. Textual research: [[Poetry·Qin Feng·Yan Ruwo Dan Jian] Dan is like a character, and Han poetry composes it. The sound tarts are reversed. Ochre also. 〕 　 I would like to follow the words of Dan Ru, the original explanation is not Zheng Jian. I would like to change the comment to an explanatory text.
